data.extraDescription: Celebrate the launch of the China server with this limited edition capsule. Items won't return to the Store or Night.Market and must be purchased as part of the complete bundle.

Celebrate Champions 2021 and support your favorite team with this limited edition bundle. From November 24th - December 12th, 50% of net proceeds from the Champions 2021 Collection will go to participating teams. Items won't return to the Store or Night.Market.

Celebrate Champions 2022 and support your favorite team with this limited edition bundle. From August 23rd - September 21st, 50% of net proceeds from the Champions 2022 Collection will go to participating teams. Items won’t return to the Store or Night.Market.
data.promoDescription: Celebrate Champions 2022 and support your favorite team with this limited edition bundle. From August 23rd - September 21st, 50% of net proceeds from the Champions 2022 Collection will go to participating teams. Items won’t return to the Store or Night.Market.

data.extraDescription: From February 8th - March 7th, 50% of net proceeds from the collection will be shared among our partner teams. Items won't return to the Store or Night.Market and must be purchased as part of the complete bundle.
data.promoDescription: From February 8th - March 7th, 50% of net proceeds from the collection will be shared among our partner teams. Items won't return to the Store or Night.Market and must be purchased as part of the complete bundle.

data.extraDescription: From Nov. 16–30, 50% of proceeds from weapon skins and 100% of proceeds from accessories in the Give Back // 2022 Bundle will go towards the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.
data.promoDescription: 50% of proceeds from weapon skins and 100% of proceeds from accessories in the Give Back // 2022 Bundle will go towards the Riot Games Social Impact Fund

data.extraDescription: From July 19 - August 4, 50% of proceeds from Weapon skins + 100% of proceeds from accessories in the Give Back // 2023 Bundle will go towards the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
